block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 模拟输入使用此块 从下拉列表中选择输入引脚 可以单击该块以获取引脚处输入的值 Analog Input uses this block Select the input pin from the drop down list Can click on the block to get the value of the input at the pin
四舍五入到小数点后 3 位 round to 3 decimal places
输入电压 = 3.3V *（读数/4095） voltage at input = 3.3V * (reading/4095)
它是一个 12 位模拟数字转换器 (ADC) 返回值为 0-4095 对应输入电压为 0-3.3V it is a 12-bit Analog-to-Digital-Converter (ADC) return value is 0-4095 corresponding to input voltage of 0-3.3V

custom-block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap
